title: Nursing Practice Competency Enhancement: Instructional Design Based on AI Diagnosis Simulation for Rare Genetic Syndromes

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Synthetic face image generation technology can be used to expand rare genetic syndrome datasets
The operational principles of AI diagnostic systems based on Diffusion models and ControlNet can be explained
Simulation tools can be used to apply performance evaluation methods for bias-free (race/age/gender) diagnostic models
Strategies to link AI diagnostic results with medical judgments can be established based on real clinical environment scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
